che16.dcs.aber.ac.uk.utils

Class Globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • che16.dcs.aber.ac.uk.utils.Globals

  • public class Globals
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is used to contain methods which are used in several locations throughout the application or variables which require application wide accessibility.
    Author:
    Christopher Edwards

      • calculateEuclidianDistance

        public static double calculateEuclidianDistance(double x1,
                                                double y1,
                                                double x2,
                                                double y2)
        Calculate the Euclidean distance between any two locations
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x coordinate for the start location
        y1 - the y coordinate for the start location
        x2 - the x coordinate for the end location
        y2 - the y coordinate for the end location
        Returns:
        the euclidean distance between the start and end location

      • linearInterpolateX

        public static double linearInterpolateX(double x1,
                                        double x2,
                                        double mu)
        Retrieve the x coordinate for the specified point on a line
        Parameters:
        x1 - the start x coordinate of the line
        x2 - the end x coordinate of the line
        mu - the distance along the line you wish to find
        Returns:
        the x coordinate for the specified location
